import React from 'react' import { connect} from 'react-redux' import * as actions from '../store/actions/index' const OrderItem = (props) => { console.log(props) return props.product_item && props.product_item ? ( <>
{/*
{"Delivered"}

{props.product_item[0].name}

Ordered: {props.order.ordered_date}

Order#{props.order.number}

*/}
) : null }; export default OrderItem;
